local_intent: Lower the held bottle toward the table slowly until contact is detected, after verifying target spot and grasp.
assumptions: clear_spot_table is detectable in the scene
pepsi_bottle is currently held in the gripper
Contact sensing is available to confirm surface touch
coherence_with_global: Implements the LowerUntilContact phase of the global plan, preceded by detecting the clear spot and confirming the object is held, and followed by verifying contact before release and retreat steps in the global tree.
